title: WCAS MENA 390-3-24 Advanced Topics in Middle East & North African Studies
topic: Culture, Media, and Politics in Post-Revolutionary

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course will explore the cultural policies of the Islamic Republic in Iran since 1979. We will focus on media (TV and Radio, Internet, music, cinema, cartoons, Satire, Video game,and the press) to analyze the dynamic of state and societal relations in today's Iran. The central questions that we will answer during this course are: Why and How has the political regime used the media to propagate its ideology, control the society, and shape the "ideal citizen"? To what extent has the state been successful in their efforts? How have the people used the media, especially social media, to ignore, undermine, and challenge the state authority?
